Giorgos Tolias

Assistant Professor, Czech Technical University

Karlovo namesti 13, 121 35, Praha 2, Czech Republic

I am an assistant professor at the Czech Technical University in Prague and a member of the Visual Recognition Group. Before I was a postdoc at the LinkMedia team of Inria Rennes. I obtained my Ph.D from the National Technical University of Athens where I worked with the Image and Video Analysis Team.

Research Interests

My research is on computer vision with a focus on

  • Large scale visual recognition
Open PhD positions

See here for more details.

news

Nov 2020 I got awared a Junior Star grant from the Czech Science foundation.
Oct 2020 New but old: Python implementation of ASMK: sota retrieval approach with local descriptors since 2013!
Jul 2020 Two papers accepted at ECCV 2020
  • Learning and aggregating deep local descriptors for instance-level recognition (Oral)
  • Graph convolutional networks for learning with few clean and many noisy labels
Jan 2020 I will serve as an Area Chair for ECCV 2020.
Jan 2020 The Vision and Sports Summer School is back: VS3 2020 (but canceled because of covid)
